Summary: An exclimation mark was made in the sky, Probably many miles away.
trends: There have been no other sightings in not real sure
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the beautiful sunset and noticed an illuminated cloud forming straight down, all by itself so it wasn't a tornado, unless it was some kind of indepindent tornado. Anyhew, this illuminated cloud stopped forming for a second then continued and made a dot, so it appeared to stop forming again. Then, the cloud began forming again. It got as long as the top part of the "!" then began to swirll at the bottom. I don't know if I was just looking at a jet, many miles away and moving exactly away from my point of observance. This may not be an "experience", which it's totaly cool if its not, it's just unknown to me. I wish to share that I have come to believe (long before this, I once got freaked out about a green bolide I got to see and thought about contacting mufon), if we all can believe, where do we go from there.
